welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vadnais Heights, the charming city known for its scenic views and friendly community. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Downtown Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport provides a comfortable and convenient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport handles all freight and cargo operations, ensuring efficient and timely delivery of goods.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport caters to the needs of private and corporate aircraft, offering exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flying Cloud Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private planes, the airport offers a separate terminal with luxurious lounges and personalized services.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Crystal Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
